message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it will be highly valuable to you, given your needs. I'm asking for $14,000 to start. What do you think?

I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe it's a fair price, considering the value I'll get from the product.

Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your position, but $12,000 is a bit too low for me to consider.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,000? It's a win-win that reflects the value this product will bring you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but I'm hoping we can work together to find a price that works for both of us. Can we discuss some compromises?
